Text:
this torrent contains all the same books in PDF format.  The pdfs don't have any format errors.  If you find a book you want to read in this torrent that's scrambled you can try your hand at doing your own conversion from pdf to mobi or epub.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6746842

An excellent place to get eBooks in multiple formats is:

http://bolt.cd/board/forum.php?referrerid=657416 

Cheers
